tool_description: Hashtag suggestions, auto-hashtagging, emoji suggestions, text to image, text to GIF, company logo and more APIs for social media marketers.
name: RiteKit
title: RiteKit

api_list.name: /instagram/hashtags-cleaner

required_parameters.name: post
required_parameters.description: List of hashtags with # marks divided by spaces (eg. #instagirls #instanature #instagirl #photography #beauty #girls #nature #girl #sky #water #lady #ladies #woman #women)

api_list.name: /images/animate
/emoji/suggestions

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: TIL the Austrian mathematician Kurt Godel had an obsessive fear of being poisoned, and would only eat food prepared by his wife. When she had to be hospitalized in 1977, he refused to eat at all and died weighing 65 pounds.

api_list.name: /search/trending

optional_parameters.name: latin
optional_parameters.description: Restricts results only to hashtags with latin characters

optional_parameters.name: green
optional_parameters.description: Restricts results only to green hashtags. Hides overused (red) hashtags.

api_list.name: /emoji/auto-emojify

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: Have you ever imagined how interstellar travel could work?

api_list.name: /stats/hashtag-suggestions/{topic}
api_list.url: https://ritekit-ritekit-v1.p.rapidapi.com/stats/hashtag-suggestions/Have you ever imagined how interstellar travel could work?

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description: Full text of the post (max. 1000 characters) or a single-word topic (eg. seo)
required_parameters.default: Have you ever imagined how interstellar travel could work?

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ritekit-ritekit-v1.p.rapidapi.com/stats/hashtag-suggestions/Have you ever imagined how interstellar travel could work?"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ritekit-ritekit-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ritekit-ritekit-v1.p.rapidapi.com/stats/hashtag-suggestions/{topic}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ritekit-ritekit-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /images/quote

required_parameters.name: quote
required_parameters.default: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of. ⏳

required_parameters.name: quotefontcolor
required_parameters.description: Font color of the quote text

required_parameters.name: author
required_parameters.description: Text of the smaller second line (author/source)

required_parameters.name: backgroundcolor
required_parameters.description: Background color for solid background type

required_parameters.name: fontsize
required_parameters.description: Font size for the quote (second line font size is calculated automatically)

required_parameters.name: quotefont
required_parameters.description: Font-family used for quote text (AlegreyaSC, ABeeZee, AmaticSC, Bangers, BungeeShade, ChelseaMarket, Courgette, DancingScript, Lato Black, LifeSavers, Lora, Montserrat, PassionOne, PlayfairDisplay, SourceSansPro)

required_parameters.name: authorfont
required_parameters.description: Font-family used for the second line (author/source) (AlegreyaSC, ABeeZee, AmaticSC, Bangers, BungeeShade, ChelseaMarket, Courgette, DancingScript, Lato Black, LifeSavers, Lora, Montserrat, PassionOne, PlayfairDisplay, SourceSansPro)

optional_parameters.name: gradientcolor1
optional_parameters.description: First color for gradient background type

optional_parameters.name: authorfontcolor
optional_parameters.description: Font color of the second line (author/source)

optional_parameters.name: animation
optional_parameters.description: Animation type: none, rays, glint, circle

optional_parameters.name: gradientcolor2
optional_parameters.description: Second color for gradient background type

api_list.name: /images/logo

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: URL or domain of a website

api_list.name: /stats/auto-hashtag

required_parameters.name: post
required_parameters.default: Is artificial intelligence the future of customer service?

optional_parameters.name: maxhashtags
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of hashtags that should be added

optional_parameters.name: hashtagposition
optional_parameters.description: Specifies if hashtags can be placed inside the original text (Social Media => #SocialMedia) or only at the end. Values: auto, end

api_list.name: /stats/multiple-hashtags
